00032 //! Base class of NMR Pulsers
00033 class XPulser : public XPrimaryDriver
00034 {   
00035     XNODE_OBJECT
00036 protected:
00037     XPulser(const char *name, bool runtime,
00038             const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00039             const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00040             const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00041             const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers);
00042 public:
00043     virtual ~XPulser() {}
00044     //! show all forms belonging to driver
00045     virtual void showForms();
00046 
00047     //! driver specific part below
00048 
00049     
00050     //! \sa combMode(), combModeRecorded().
00051     enum {N_COMB_MODE_OFF = 0, N_COMB_MODE_ON = 1, N_COMB_MODE_P1_ALT = 2, N_COMB_MODE_COMB_ALT = 3}; 
00052     //! \sa rtMode(), rtModeRecorded().
00053     enum {N_RT_MODE_FIXREP = 0, N_RT_MODE_FIXREST = 1};
00054     //! \sa numPhaseCycle(), numPhaseCycleRecorded().
00055     enum {MAX_NUM_PHASE_CYCLE = 16};
00056     //! # of digital-pulse ports.
00057     enum {NUM_DO_PORTS= 16};
00058     
00059     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode> &output() const {return m_output;}
00060     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> &combMode() const {return m_combMode;} //!< see above definitions in header file
00061     //! Control period to next pulse sequence
00062     //! Fix Repetition Time or Fix Rest Time which means time between pulse sequences 
00063     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> &rtMode() const {return m_rtMode;}
00064     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> &numPhaseCycle() const {return m_numPhaseCycle;} //!< How many cycles in phase cycling
00065     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &rtime() const {return m_rt;} //!< Repetition/Rest Time [ms]
00066     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &tau() const {return m_tau;}  //!< [us]
00067     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &combPW() const {return m_combPW;} //!< PulseWidths [us]
00068     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &pw1() const {return m_pw1;} //!< PulseWidths [us]
00069     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &pw2() const {return m_pw2;} //!< PulseWidths [us]
00070     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &combPT() const {return m_combPT;} //!< Comb pulse periodic term [us]
00071     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &combP1() const {return m_combP1;} //!< P1 and P1 alternative
00072     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &combP1Alt() const {return m_combP1Alt;} //!< P1 and P1 alternative
00073     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &aswSetup() const {return m_aswSetup;} //!< Analog switch setting, setup(proceeding) time before the first spin echo
00074     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &aswHold() const {return m_aswHold;}  //!< Analog switch setting, hold time after the last spin echo
00075     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &altSep() const {return m_altSep;} //!< Separation time in DSO record, cause a shift of trigger of DSO in alternatively mode
00076     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &g2Setup() const {return m_g2Setup;} //!< Setup time of pre-gating port and QPSK
00077     const shared_ptr<XUIntNode> &combNum() const {return m_combNum;} //!< # of comb pulses
00078     const shared_ptr<XUIntNode> &echoNum() const {return m_echoNum;} //!< # of Spin echoes (i.e. pi pulses)
00079     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode> &drivenEquilibrium() const {return m_drivenEquilibrium;} //!< polarize spins after pulse sequence or not
00080     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &combOffRes() const {return m_combOffRes;} //!< off-resonance comb pulses
00081     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> &combFunc() const {return m_combFunc;} //!< Pulse Modulation
00082     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> &p1Func() const {return m_p1Func;} //!< Pulse Modulation
00083     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> &p2Func() const {return m_p2Func;} //!< Pulse Modulation
00084     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &combLevel() const {return m_combLevel;} //!< [dB], Pulse Modulation
00085     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &p1Level() const {return m_p1Level;} //!< [dB], Pulse Modulation
00086     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &p2Level() const {return m_p2Level;} //!< [dB], Pulse Modulation
00087     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &masterLevel() const {return m_masterLevel;} //!< [dB]
00088     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode> &induceEmission() const {return m_induceEmission;}
00089     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &induceEmissionPhase() const {return m_induceEmissionPhase;}
00090     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &qamOffset1() const {return m_qamOffset1;}
00091     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &qamOffset2() const {return m_qamOffset2;} //!< [%F.S.]
00092     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &qamLevel1() const {return m_qamLevel1;} //! < Quadrature Amplitude Modulation. Amplitude compensation factor.
00093     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &qamLevel2() const {return m_qamLevel2;}
00094     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &qamDelay1() const {return m_qamDelay1;} //! < Delaying compensation [us].
00095     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &qamDelay2() const {return m_qamDelay2;} //!< [us]
00096     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &difFreq() const {return m_difFreq;} //!< [MHz]
00097     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &qswDelay() const {return m_qswDelay;} //!< Q-switch setting, period after the end-edge of pulses [us].
00098     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &qswWidth() const {return m_qswWidth;} //!< Q-switch setting, width of suppression [us].
00099     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &qswSoftSWOff() const {return m_qswSoftSWOff;} //!< Q-switch setting, second pulse [us].
00100     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode> &qswPiPulseOnly() const {return m_qswPiPulseOnly;} //!< Q-switch setting, use QSW only for pi pulses.
00101     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode> &invertPhase() const {return m_invertPhase;}
00102     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode> &conserveStEPhase() const {return m_conserveStEPhase;}
00103     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> &portSel(unsigned int port) const {
00104         ASSERT(port < NUM_DO_PORTS);
00105         return m_portSel[port];
00106     }
00107     
00108     //! ver 1 records.
00109     int16_t combModeRecorded() const {return m_combModeRecorded;}
00110     double rtimeRecorded() const {return m_rtimeRecorded;}
00111     double tauRecorded() const {return m_tauRecorded;}
00112     double pw1Recorded() const {return m_pw1Recorded;}
00113     double pw2Recorded() const {return m_pw2Recorded;}
00114     double combP1Recorded() const {return m_combP1Recorded;}
00115     double altSepRecorded() const {return m_altSepRecorded;}
00116     double combP1AltRecorded() const {return m_combP1AltRecorded;}
00117     double aswSetupRecorded() const {return m_aswSetupRecorded;}
00118     double aswHoldRecorded() const {return m_aswHoldRecorded;}
00119     //! ver 2 records.
00120     double difFreqRecorded() const {return m_difFreqRecorded;}
00121     double combPWRecorded() const {return m_combPWRecorded;}
00122     double combPTRecorded() const {return m_combPTRecorded;}
00123     uint16_t echoNumRecorded() const {return m_echoNumRecorded;}
00124     uint16_t combNumRecorded() const {return m_combNumRecorded;}
00125     int16_t rtModeRecorded() const {return m_rtModeRecorded;}
00126     uint16_t numPhaseCycleRecorded() const {return m_numPhaseCycleRecorded;}
00127     //! ver 3 records [experimental].
00128     bool invertPhaseRecorded() const {return m_invertPhaseRecorded;}
00129     
00130     //! periodic term of one cycle [ms].
00131     double periodicTermRecorded() const;
00132 protected:
00133     //! indice for return values of portSel().
00134     enum {PORTSEL_UNSEL = -1,
00135           PORTSEL_GATE = 0, PORTSEL_PREGATE = 1, PORTSEL_GATE3 = 2,
00136           PORTSEL_TRIG1 = 3, PORTSEL_TRIG2 = 4, PORTSEL_ASW = 5, PORTSEL_QSW = 6,
00137           PORTSEL_PULSE1 = 7, PORTSEL_PULSE2 = 8, 
00138           PORTSEL_COMB = 9, PORTSEL_COMB_FM = 10,
00139           PORTSEL_QPSK_A = 11, PORTSEL_QPSK_B = 12,
00140           PORTSEL_QPSK_OLD_NONINV = 13, PORTSEL_QPSK_OLD_INV = 14,
00141           PORTSEL_QPSK_OLD_PSGATE = 15,
00142           /*PORTSEL_PAUSING = 16*/};
00143     //! \arg func e.g. PORTSEL_GATE.
00144     //! \return bit mask.
00145     unsigned int selectedPorts(int func) const;
00146     //! for RelPatList patterns. \sa RelPatList.
00147     enum {PAT_DO_MASK = (1 << NUM_DO_PORTS) - 1,
00148           PAT_QAM_PHASE = (1 << NUM_DO_PORTS),
00149           PAT_QAM_PHASE_MASK = PAT_QAM_PHASE * 3,
00150           PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX = PAT_QAM_PHASE * 4,
00151           PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX_P1 = PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX * 1,
00152           PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX_P2 = PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX * 2,
00153           PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX_PCOMB = PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX * 3,
00154           PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX_INDUCE_EMISSION = PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX * 4,
00155           PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX_MASK = PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX * 15,
00156           PAT_QAM_MASK = PAT_QAM_PHASE_MASK | PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX_MASK,
00157     };
00158  
00159     //! Start up your threads, connect GUI, and activate signals
00160     virtual void start();
00161     //! Shut down your threads, unconnect GUI, and deactivate signals
00162     //! this may be called even if driver has already stopped.
00163     virtual void stop();
00164   
00165     //! this is called when raw is written 
00166     //! unless dependency is broken
00167     //! convert raw to record
00168     virtual void analyzeRaw() throw (XRecordError&);
00169     //! this is called after analyze() or analyzeRaw()
00170     //! record is readLocked
00171     virtual void visualize();

00197     struct RelPat {
00198         RelPat(uint32_t pat, uint64_t t, uint64_t toapp) :
00199             pattern(pat), time(t), toappear(toapp) {}
00200         uint32_t pattern;
00201         uint64_t time; //!< unit of resolution().
00202         uint64_t toappear; //!< term between this pattern and the previous. unit of resolution().
00203     };
00204 
00205     typedef std::deque<RelPat> RelPatList;
00206     RelPatList m_relPatList;
00207     typedef RelPatList::iterator RelPatListIterator;

00217     virtual void changeOutput(bool output, unsigned int blankpattern) = 0;

00219     virtual void createNativePatterns() = 0;

00221     virtual double resolution() const = 0;

00224     virtual double minPulseWidth() const = 0;
00225     //! existense of AO ports.
00226     virtual bool haveQAMPorts() const = 0;

00229     {return m_qamWaveForm[idx];}

00318 
00319 inline double
00320 XPulser::rintTermMilliSec(double msec) const {
00321     double res = resolution();
00322     return rint(msec / res) * res;
00323 }
00324 inline double
00325 XPulser::rintTermMicroSec(double usec) const {
00326     double res = resolution() * 1e3;
00327     return rint(usec / res) * res;
00328 }
00329 inline uint64_t
00330 XPulser::ceilSampsMicroSec(double usec) const {
00331     double res = resolution() * 1e3;
00332     return llrint(usec / res + 0.499);
00333 }
00334 inline uint64_t
00335 XPulser::rintSampsMicroSec(double usec) const {
00336     double res = resolution() * 1e3;
00337     return llrint(usec / res);
00338 }
00339 inline uint64_t
00340 XPulser::rintSampsMilliSec(double msec) const {
00341     double res = resolution();
00342     return llrint(msec / res);
00343 }
